data.name: Animal Babysister Fighter : Zombie Coming!
data.detailed_description:
"Animal Babysister Fighter" is a third-person shooter game that includes TD elements. The team consists of four brave girls. in the futuristic world they drives the spaceship through the galaxy to escort the survived animals to the shelter.

The players are fighting with the enemies in an abandoned factory, the first colonial planet, the Asian village of the earth and the night town. You have to defeat defeat all kinds of monsters, the night devil in the night town, and fight the giant monster in Outpost to escort the animals reaching their new habitat.

To deal with powerful enemies, Players need a variety of high-tech weapons. Apart from the classic turret, there are the TR1-Z1 humanoid robot and the powerful TM1-K1 movable turret.

GamePlay

Please escort the animals to the destination. The primary target of the monster is the animals. Please protect your animals along the way



  • Support 4-player online coop, let’s defeat your enemies together.
  • You can build a variety of turrets, collect coins and form your robot army.
  • Every level has an interesting story, collect various information to benefit the next fight。
  • Variety of enemies - hordes of zombies, large flock of crows, giant parasite, night Stalker, etc.
  • There are interesting interactive props in certain levels, such as satellite laser cannons, Charged Weapon Console, and kind-hearted NPC characters.
  • Support Voice Chat.

data.short_description: Zombies and monsters are taking over several planets in the galaxy. As a result, animals are losing their habitats. Your mission is to protect those animals. Use your spaceship to transport the threatened species to shelters on humanity's first star colony!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB | AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
